## RadioGroup.readOnly property

When true, the child radios will be immutable by user interaction. See [readonly HTML attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/readonly) for more information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readOnly: boolean;
```

## Remarks

HTML Attribute: readonly
